{%- style -%} .tp-body-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-body-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; gap: {{ section.settings.gap_desktop }}px; } {%- for block in section.blocks -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} { width: 100%; margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } /* Image Block */ {%- if block.type == 'image' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} { display: flex; justify-content: {{ block.settings.image_alignment }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} img { width: {{ block.settings.width_desktop }}%; height: auto; display: block; border-radius: {{ block.settings.image_radius }}px; object-fit: cover; } {%- endif -%} /* Text Block */ {%- if block.type == 'text' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte { color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_desktop }}; text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align }}; font-weight: {{ block.settings.font_weight }}; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte a { color: {{ block.settings.link_color }}; text-decoration: underline; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte p { margin: 0 0 1em 0; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte p:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte h1, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte h2, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte h3, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte h4, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte h5, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte h6 { color: inherit; line-height: 1.2; margin-bottom: 0.5em; } {%- endif -%} /* Note Box Block */ {%- if block.type == 'note_box' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .note-box { background-color: {{ block.settings.box_bg_color }}; border-radius: {{ block.settings.box_radius }}px; padding: {{ block.settings.box_padding }}px; display: flex; align-items: stretch; gap: 15px; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .accent-bar { width: {{ block.settings.bar_width }}px; background-color: {{ block.settings.bar_color }}; border-radius: 4px; flex-shrink: 0; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .note-content { color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_desktop }}; flex: 1; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .note-content p { margin: 0; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .note-content strong { font-weight: 700; } {%- endif -%} /* Mobile Styles */ @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-block-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top_mobile | default: block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom_mobile | default: block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'image' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} img { width: {{ block.settings.width_mobile }}%; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'text' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_mobile }}; text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align_mobile }}; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'note_box' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .note-content { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_mobile }}; } {%- endif -%} } {%- endfor -%} @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-body-container-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0 15px; gap: {{ section.settings.gap_mobile }}px; } } {%- endstyle -%}

{%- style -%} .author-summary-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .author-summary-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; } /* Author Info Styles */ .author-info-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .author-image-{{ section.id }} { width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; display: block; } .author-text-content-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 2px; } .author-name-{{ section.id }} { font-weight: 700; color: {{ section.settings.author_name_color }}; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.2; } .last-updated-{{ section.id }} { color: {{ section.settings.last_updated_color }}; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.2; } /* Summary Box Styles */ .summary-box-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.box_background_color }}; padding: 20px; border-radius: 4px; } .summary-content-{{ section.id }} { color: {{ section.settings.summary_text_color }}; font-size: {{ section.settings.summary_font_size_desktop }}px; line-height: {{ section.settings.summary_line_height_desktop }}; --highlight-color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }}; } .summary-content-{{ section.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } .summary-content-{{ section.id }} p { margin: 0; } .summary-content-{{ section.id }} strong { font-weight: 700; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .summary-content-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ section.settings.summary_font_size_mobile }}px; line-height: {{ section.settings.summary_line_height_mobile }}; } .author-summary-container-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0 15px; } } {%- endstyle -%}

max-width: {{ block.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .progress-label { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 8px; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size }}px; sections.name: countdown-timer
sections.liquidCode:
{% style %} #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-section-wrapper { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; color: {{ section.settings.text_color }}; padding: 15px 20px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-container { display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 40px; width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; flex-wrap: nowrap; /* Prevent wrapping on desktop */ } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-text-content { text-align: right; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-end; flex-shrink: 0; /* Prevent text from shrinking too much */ } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-heading { font-size: {{ section.settings.heading_size_desktop }}px; font-weight: 700; margin: 0; line-height: 1.2; letter-spacing: 0.5px; text-transform: uppercase; color: inherit; white-space: nowrap; --highlight-color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }}; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-heading .tp-highlight { color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-subheading { font-size: {{ section.settings.subheading_size_desktop }}px; margin: 2px 0 0; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-end; gap: 8px; font-weight: 400; opacity: 0.9; color: inherit; white-space: nowrap; --highlight-color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }}; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-subheading .tp-highlight { color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-icon { width: 24px; height: 24px; object-fit: contain; display: block; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-timer { display: flex; gap: 15px; align-items: flex-start; flex-shrink: 0; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-block { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; min-width: 40px; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-number { font-size: {{ section.settings.timer_number_size_desktop }}px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1; font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-label { font-size: {{ section.settings.timer_label_size_desktop }}px; margin-top: 4px; text-transform: lowercase; opacity: 0.8; font-weight: 400; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-separator { font-size: {{ section.settings.timer_number_size_desktop | times: 0.7 | round }}px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1; margin-top: 4px; } /* Mobile Responsive Styles */ @media screen and (max-width: 990px) { #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-container { flex-direction: column; gap: 20px; flex-wrap: wrap; text-align: center; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-text-content { align-items: center; text-align: center; width: 100%; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-heading { white-space: normal; font-size: {{ section.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-subheading { justify-content: center; white-space: normal; font-size: {{ section.settings.subheading_size_mobile }}px; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .countdown-timer { justify-content: center; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-number { font-size: {{ section.settings.timer_number_size_mobile }}px; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-label { font-size: {{ section.settings.timer_label_size_mobile }}px; } #shopify-section-{{ section.id }} .timer-separator { font-size: {{ section.settings.timer_number_size_mobile | times: 0.7 | round }}px; } } {% endstyle %}

sections.name: cta-banner
sections.liquidCode:
{%- style -%} .tp-cta-banner-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-cta-banner-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; } .tp-cta-box-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.box_bg_color }}; border: {{ section.settings.border_width }}px {{ section.settings.border_style }} {{ section.settings.border_color }}; border-radius: {{ section.settings.border_radius }}px; padding: {{ section.settings.box_padding_desktop }}px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 30px; width: 100%; } /* Text Block Styles */ .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} { flex: 1; } .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte { color: {{ section.settings.text_color }}; } .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte h1, .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte h2, .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte h3, .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte h4, .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte h5, .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte h6 { margin: 0 0 0.5em 0; line-height: 1.2; color: inherit; font-weight: 700; } .tp-cta-text-{{ section.id }} .rte p { margin: 0; line-height: 1.4; } /* Button Block Styles */ .tp-cta-button-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { flex-shrink: 0; } .tp-cta-btn-{{ section.id }} { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; text-decoration: none; padding: 15px 40px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 16px; transition: all 0.3s ease; border: none; cursor: pointer; line-height: 1; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .tp-cta-btn-{{ section.id }}:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 6px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } /* Block Loop Styles */ {%- for block in section.blocks -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { /* Generic block margin if needed */ } {%- if block.type == 'text' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; {%- style -%} .tp-faq-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-faq-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } /* Headline Block */ .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 30px; } .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte { color: {{ section.settings.text_color }}; text-align: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h1, .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h2, .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h3, .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h4, .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h5, .tp-faq-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h6 { margin: 0 0 0.5em 0; line-height: 1.2; color: inherit; font-weight: 700; } /* Accordion Item */ .tp-faq-item-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid {{ section.settings.divider_color }}; overflow: hidden; } .tp-faq-trigger-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; width: 100%; padding: 20px 0; background: none; border: none; cursor: pointer; text-align: left; gap: 15px; } .tp-faq-question-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 500; color: {{ section.settings.question_color }}; margin: 0; line-height: 1.4; } .tp-faq-icon-{{ section.id }} { flex-shrink: 0; width: 32px; height: 32px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: #f0f0f0; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; transition: transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease; } .tp-faq-icon-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 14px; height: 14px; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .tp-faq-item-{{ section.id }}[open] .tp-faq-icon-{{ section.id }} { transform: rotate(45deg); } .tp-faq-content-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; grid-template-rows: 0fr; transition: grid-template-rows 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1); } .tp-faq-inner-{{ section.id }} { overflow: hidden; } .tp-faq-item-{{ section.id }}[open] .tp-faq-content-{{ section.id }} { grid-template-rows: 1fr; } .tp-faq-answer-{{ section.id }} { padding-bottom: 20px; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; color: {{ section.settings.answer_color }}; } .tp-faq-answer-{{ section.id }} p:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; } /* Button Block */ .tp-faq-button-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: 40px; width: 100%; display: flex; justify-content: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } .tp-faq-btn-{{ section.id }} { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; text-decoration: none; padding: 15px 40px; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 16px; transition: all 0.3s ease; border: none; cursor: pointer; width: auto; } .tp-faq-btn-{{ section.id }}:hover { opacity: 0.9; transform: translateY(-2px); } /* Block Styles Loop */ {%- for block in section.blocks -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'headline' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_desktop }}; color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'faq_item' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-faq-question-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ block.settings.question_size }}px; font-weight: {{ block.settings.question_weight }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-faq-icon-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ block.settings.icon_bg_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-faq-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ block.settings.icon_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-faq-answer-{{ section.id }} { --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'button' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-faq-btn-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ block.settings.btn_bg_color }}; color: {{ block.settings.btn_text_color }}; border-radius: {{ block.settings.btn_radius }}px; } {%- endif -%} /* Mobile Block Styles */ @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top_mobile }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom_mobile }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'headline' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_mobile }}; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'button' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-faq-btn-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; } {%- endif -%} } {%- endfor -%} @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-faq-container-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0 15px; } } {%- endstyle -%}

{%- style -%} .tp-offer-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color_outer }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-offer-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .tp-offer-box-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color_inner }}; border: {{ section.settings.border_width }}px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }}; border-radius: {{ section.settings.border_radius }}px; padding: {{ section.settings.box_padding_desktop }}px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; text-align: center; } /* Blocks common styles */ .tp-offer-block-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 15px; } .tp-offer-block-{{ section.id }}:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; } /* Countdown Styles */ .countdown-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 10px; } .countdown-item-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; background-color: var(--timer-bg); color: var(--timer-color); width: 60px; height: 60px; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.05); } .timer-number-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 20px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1; } .timer-label-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 10px; text-transform: uppercase; margin-top: 4px; line-height: 1; opacity: 0.8; } /* Button Styles */ .tp-button-{{ section.id }} { display: inline-flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; transition: opacity 0.2s ease; width: 100%; max-width: 100%; border: none; line-height: 1.2; } .tp-button-{{ section.id }}:hover { opacity: 0.9; } /* Info Box Styles */ .tp-info-box-{{ section.id }} { background-color: var(--infobox-bg); padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 4px; display: inline-block; width: auto; } .tp-info-box-{{ section.id }} .rte p { margin: 0; } /* Typography logic from flexible row */ {%- for block in section.blocks -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'text' or block.type == 'info_box' -%} /* Desktop Settings */ #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte p, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte li, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte a, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte span, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte strong, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte em { {%- if block.settings.text_color != blank and block.settings.text_color != 'rgba(0,0,0,0)' -%} color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; {%- endif -%} font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px !important; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_desktop }} !important; font-weight: {{ block.settings.font_weight }} !important; text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align }} !important; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } /* Headings separate handling (Theme styles + alignment/color) */ #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h1, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h2, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h3, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h4, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h5, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h6 { text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align }} !important; {%- if block.settings.text_color != blank and block.settings.text_color != 'rgba(0,0,0,0)' -%} color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; {%- endif -%} margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0.5em; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'button' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-button-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ block.settings.btn_bg_color }}; color: {{ block.settings.btn_text_color }}; font-size: {{ block.settings.btn_font_size }}px; font-weight: {{ block.settings.btn_font_weight }}; padding: {{ block.settings.btn_padding_y }}px {{ block.settings.btn_padding_x }}px; border-radius: {{ block.settings.btn_radius }}px; text-transform: uppercase; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'countdown' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .countdown-item-{{ section.id }} { --timer-bg: {{ block.settings.box_bg_color }}; --timer-color: {{ block.settings.number_color }}; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'info_box' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-info-box-{{ section.id }} { --infobox-bg: {{ block.settings.box_bg_color }}; } {%- endif -%} /* Mobile Responsive overrides */ @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top_mobile }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom_mobile }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'text' or block.type == 'info_box' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte p, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte li, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte a, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte span, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte strong, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte em { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px !important; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_mobile }} !important; text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align_mobile }} !important; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h1, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h2, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h3, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h4, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h5, #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte h6 { text-align: {{ block.settings.text_align_mobile }} !important; width: 100%; /* Full width on mobile usually looks better */ } {%- endif -%} } {%- endfor -%} @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-offer-box-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ section.settings.box_padding_mobile }}px; {%- style -%} .tp-features-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-features-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: {{ section.settings.gap_desktop }}px; } /* Header Area (Headline + Text) */ .tp-features-header-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 20px; } .tp-features-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h1, .tp-features-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h2, .tp-features-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h3, .tp-features-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h4, .tp-features-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h5, .tp-features-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h6 { margin: 0; line-height: 1.2; color: inherit; font-weight: 700; } .tp-features-text-{{ section.id }} .rte { line-height: 1.6; } .tp-features-text-{{ section.id }} .rte p { margin: 0; } /* Content Grid (Benefits + Image) */ .tp-features-content-grid-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 0.8fr; gap: {{ section.settings.grid_gap }}px; align-items: center; } /* Benefits List Grid */ .tp-features-benefits-list-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 20px; } .tp-features-benefit-item-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; } .tp-features-benefit-icon-{{ section.id }} { flex-shrink: 0; width: 24px; height: 24px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .tp-features-benefit-icon-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 14px; height: 14px; display: block; } .tp-features-benefit-text-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.4; color: {{ section.settings.benefit_text_color }}; font-weight: 500; } /* Image Side */ .tp-features-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; height: auto; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .tp-features-image-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; object-fit: cover; } /* Block Styles */ {%- for block in section.blocks -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'headline' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; text-align: {{ block.settings.alignment }}; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'text' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; text-align: {{ block.settings.alignment }}; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }} !important; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'benefit_item' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-features-benefit-icon-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ block.settings.icon_bg_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-features-benefit-icon-{{ section.id }} svg path { fill: {{ block.settings.icon_color }}; } #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-features-benefit-text-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'image' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-features-image-{{ section.id }} { border-radius: {{ block.settings.image_radius }}px; } {%- endif -%} /* Mobile Styles */ @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top_mobile }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom_mobile }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'headline' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'text' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'benefit_item' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .tp-features-benefit-text-{{ section.id }} { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; } {%- endif -%} } {%- endfor -%} @media screen and (max-width: 990px) { .tp-features-content-grid-{{ section.id }} { grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 40px; } .tp-features-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { order: -1; /* Image top on mobile if desired, or remove to have bottom */ } } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-features-container-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0 15px; } .tp-features-benefits-list-{{ section.id }} { grid-template-columns: 1fr; /* 1 column on small mobile */ } } {%- endstyle -%}

{%- style -%} .tp-reviews-section-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-reviews-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; gap: {{ section.settings.gap_desktop }}px; } /* Headline Block */ .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; } .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte { color: {{ section.settings.text_color }}; text-align: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h1, .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h2, .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h3, .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h4, .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h5, .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte h6 { margin: 0 0 0.5em 0; line-height: 1.2; color: inherit; font-weight: 700; } .tp-reviews-headline-{{ section.id }} .rte p { margin: 0; } /* Reviews Grid */ .tp-reviews-grid-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat({{ section.settings.columns_desktop }}, 1fr); gap: {{ section.settings.grid_gap }}px; width: 100%; } /* Review Card */ .tp-review-card-{{ section.id }} { height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; overflow: hidden; } .tp-review-card-content-{{ section.id }} { padding: 20px; flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px; } .tp-review-card-image-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; object-fit: cover; } .tp-review-header-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 5px; } .tp-review-name-{{ section.id }} { font-weight: 700; font-size: 16px; margin: 0; } .tp-review-stars-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; gap: 2px; } .tp-review-stars-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 16px; height: 16px; } .tp-review-badge-{{ section.id }} { display: inline-block; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; align-self: flex-start; } .tp-review-text-{{ section.id }} { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; flex: 1; } .tp-review-text-{{ section.id }} p { margin: 0 0 10px 0; } .tp-review-text-{{ section.id }} p:last-child { margin: 0; } .tp-review-tags-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 8px; margin-top: auto; padding-top: 10px; } .tp-review-tag-{{ section.id }} { border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px; padding: 2px 8px; font-size: 11px; color: #666; background: #fff; } /* Block Styles Loop */ {%- for block in section.blocks -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'review_headline' -%} #block-{{ section.id }}-{{ block.id }} .rte { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_desktop }}; color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; {%- style -%} .tp-ad-header-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ section.settings.background_color }}; padding-top: {{ section.settings.padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ section.settings.padding_bottom }}px; width: 100%; } .tp-ad-container-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ section.settings.max_width }}px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; gap: {{ section.settings.gap_desktop }}px; } {%- for block in section.blocks -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} { width: 100%; margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } /* Rating Summary Block */ {%- if block.type == 'rating_summary' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rating-content { display: flex; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 8px; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size }}px; color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; justify-content: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .rating-star-icon { width: 20px; height: 20px; display: inline-block; color: {{ block.settings.star_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .trustpilot-logo { height: 24px; width: auto; object-fit: contain; } {%- endif -%} /* Star Box Block */ {%- if block.type == 'star_box' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .star-box-wrapper { display: inline-flex; padding: {{ block.settings.box_padding_y }}px {{ block.settings.box_padding_x }}px; border-radius: {{ block.settings.border_radius }}px; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .star-icon { width: {{ block.settings.star_size }}px; height: {{ block.settings.star_size }}px; margin-right: 2px; display: block; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .star-icon path { fill: {{ block.settings.star_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .star-icon rect { fill: {{ block.settings.star_bg_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .star-icon:last-child { margin-right: 0; } {%- endif -%} /* Headline & Text Blocks */ {%- if block.type == 'headline' or block.type == 'text' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content { color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; text-align: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; --highlight-color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .tp-highlight { color: {{ block.settings.highlight_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content h1, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content h2, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content h3, .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content p { margin: 0; color: inherit; } /* Desktop Styles */ .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_desktop }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_desktop }}; font-weight: {{ block.settings.font_weight }}; } {%- endif -%} /* Meta Info Block */ {%- if block.type == 'meta_info' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .meta-content { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; color: {{ block.settings.text_color }}; font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size }}px; justify-content: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .meta-separator { opacity: 0.6; } {%- endif -%} /* Author Block */ {%- if block.type == 'author' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .author-container { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px; justify-content: {{ section.settings.content_alignment }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .author-image { width: {{ block.settings.image_size }}px; height: {{ block.settings.image_size }}px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .author-info { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 2px; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .author-name { font-weight: bold; font-size: {{ block.settings.name_size }}px; color: {{ block.settings.name_color }}; } .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .author-title { font-size: {{ block.settings.title_size }}px; color: {{ block.settings.title_color }}; } {%- endif -%} /* Mobile Styles */ @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-block-{{ block.id }} { margin-top: {{ block.settings.margin_top_mobile | default: block.settings.margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ block.settings.margin_bottom_mobile | default: block.settings.margin_bottom }}px; } {%- if block.type == 'headline' or block.type == 'text' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .text-content { font-size: {{ block.settings.font_size_mobile }}px; line-height: {{ block.settings.line_height_mobile }}; } {%- endif -%} {%- if block.type == 'star_box' -%} .tp-block-{{ block.id }} .star-box-wrapper { padding: {{ block.settings.box_padding_y | times: 0.8 }}px {{ block.settings.box_padding_x | times: 0.8 }}px; } {%- endif -%} } {%- endfor -%} @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .tp-ad-container-{{ section.id }} { padding: 0 15px; gap: {{ section.settings.gap_mobile }}px; } } {%- endstyle -%}
